claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote identifies Flublok as a recombinant hemagglutinin (HA) vaccine, which is relevant because recombinant technology allows for the production of antigens that are an exact match to the selected WHO- and FDA-recommended flu strains, supporting the claim of identical antigenic match.
